correctness.description: Accuracy of the answers provided by the system.

reasoning_traceability.description: Ability to follow and understand the steps and logic used by the system to reach the conclusion.

step_efficiency.description: Number of steps taken to arrive at an answer, indicating the process's efficiency.

diverse_problem_solving.description: Capability of the system to handle a wide range of questions and problem types.

originality.description: The degree to which the system's answers are original and not replicated from existing internet sources.
